document_data.name: Surbrin Hills
document_data.mainbody: The '''Surbrin Hills''' was a grouping of hills found in the [[Savage Frontier]], just north of the [[Dessarin Valley]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The northern hills held the [[ancestral mound]] of the [[Uthgardt]] [[Griffon tribe]], called [[Griffon's Nest]]. As such, few travelers ventured near the region.
document_data.Inhabitants: In addition to the Uthgardt [[barbarian]]s, the Surbrin Hills housed [[orc]]s, [[hill giant]]s and other monstrous beings.
